title: Holy shit this election is close
body:
http://globalnews.ca/news/3432025/live-bc-election-2017-real-time-results/

If the Liberals win, it'll be the first time in BC history that a female has been re-elected premier, and it'll mean they'll be in power for 20 years straight.

If the NDP wins, they'll end the Liberals' 16 year reign.

Results are still coming in and it is way too close to call, although it does look like the NDP is gaining momentum.
